entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
